text_block_list.text:
One day, on a day out with Sakura 
Bakushin O――

Sakura Bakushin O was looking at 
a stuffed Uma Musume doll―a prize for 
the crane game.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's the stuffed doll that's all the rage in 
my class!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I must keep up with the 
class trends!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All right, now let's Bakushin this arm and 
try to get that stuffed doll!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! I'm going to get that stuffed 
doll with the power of Bakushin!

I can easily imagine that it would be 
impossible to get a stuffed doll by using "the 
power of Bakushin" as she says……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, what dependable words! 
You seem to be quite capable!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And, if you top it off with my support as 
class president――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Surely we'll be invincible! 
Trainer, let's do our best!
